Class InputStreamResponseParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.client.solrj.ResponseParser
      • org.apache.solr.client.solrj.impl.InputStreamResponseParser

  • public class InputStreamResponseParser
extends ResponseParser
    Simply puts the InputStream into an entry in a NamedList named "stream".
